ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok well, I just asked 2 shaman in my guild, and I got 2 different answers.  One said it was exactly the same as the mana stone, and one agrees with your
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 4 Oct 1999, Naeeldar wrote:

> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> No the shaman spell is 50hp for 25 mana.
>

Ok well, I just asked 2 shaman in my guild, and I got 2 different
answers. One said it was exactly the same as the mana stone, and one
agrees with your numbers of 50 hp and 25 mana. So, I'm assuming I was
misinformed, and I stand corrected. However, both were quick to bring up
that to use cannabalize effeciently, they have to cast it 20 times, which
takes like 2 to 3 minutes. Mana stoning 20 times takes about 15 seconds,
and the rest of the time could be spent medding. So in the end, the mana
stone is better, according to both of them anyways.

Miriana Windryder
